dmca.title: DMCA Complaint - www.redrocksunrise.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Top Secret Recipes [mailto:admin@topsecretrecipes.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, August 09, 2005 1:46 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Pamela Ellis
Subject: DMCA Complaint - www.redrocksunrise.com
Importance: High


To Whom It May Concern;
 
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner or
an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said owner being named Todd Wilbur ("IP Owner")
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/theauthor.asp. I have good faith belief that
the materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, it's
agent, or the law and therefore infringe upon the IP Owner's rights.  I
believe that cashed copies of the web site http://www.redrocksunrise.com are
hosted on one or more of your server(s) at www.theplanet.com 
 
Infringing material:
http://www.redrocksunrise.com/Red_Lobster_Recipes.htm
http://www.redrocksunrise.com/Copy_Cat_Recipes.html
http://www.redrocksunrise.com/Chilis_Recipes.htm
http://www.redrocksunrise.com/Outback.htm
http://www.redrocksunrise.com/starbucks.htm
http://www.redrocksunrise.com/Olive_Garden_recipes.htm
http://www.redrocksunrise.com/Applebees.htm
http://www.redrocksunrise.com/tgi_friday.htm

Infringed work or right includes any of Todd Wilbur's original recipes,
either from his eight books in publication: 
 
Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1993)
More Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1994)
Top Secret Restaurant Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 1997)
Top Secret Recipes Lite (Penguin/Putnam 1998)
Low Fat Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2000)
TSR Sodas, Smoothies, spirits and Shakes (Penguin/Putnam 2002)
Even More Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2002)
The Best of Top Secret Recipes (Penguin/Putnam 2003)
Top Secret Restaurant Recipes II - Registration Number TXu1-198-872
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com/store.asp
or any of the recipes he created for his web site located here:
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com.
 
 
I may be contacted at:
 
Pamela Ellis
Vice President; Top Secret Recipes, Inc.
10401 Orkiney Drive
Las Vegas, NV 89144
Email: admin@topsecretrecipes.com
Telephone: 702-254-8125
Fax: 702-254-8660
  
Given that www.redrocksunrise.com is primarily composed, if not completely
composed of a large number of pages that contain infringing material, please
act expeditiously to disable access to all cached copies of
www.redrocksunrise.com
 

Truthfully,
 
Pamela Ellis
admin@topsecretrecipes.com
http://www.topsecretrecipes.com
